mapper.select: select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by mes_no desc) as rnum , mes_send_use_id , mes_recive_use_id , mes_title , mes_content , mes_date , mes_readyn , mes_delyn from message where mes_delyn = '1' or mes_delyn='3' and mes_readyn = 'n' order by mes_no desc ) where rnum between 1 and 20 and mes_recive_use_id = #{use_id}
select * from message where mes_send_use_id =#{id} or mes_recive_use_id=#{id} and mes_delyn != '4'
mapper.update: update message set mes_readyn = 'y' where mes_no = #{message_no}
mapper.insert: insert into message(mes_no, mes_send_use_id, mes_recive_use_id, mes_title, mes_content) values(message_seq.nextval, #{mes_send_use_id}, #{mes_recive_use_id}, #{mes_title}, #{mes_content})
mapper.update: update message set mes_delyn = #{mes_delyn} where mes_no = #{mes_no}
